channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Cyber Files

item.title: CVE-2024-49391|2024-10-17T14:39:08.875Z -- acronis -- acronis%20cyber%20files
item.description: Local privilege escalation due to DLL hijacking vulnerability. The following products are affected: Acronis Cyber Files (Windows) before build 9.0.0x24.
